owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

issue_number.description: The number that identifies the issue.

sub_issue_id.description: The id of the sub-issue to reprioritize

after_id.description: The id of the sub-issue to be prioritized after (either positional argument after OR before should be specified).

before_id.description: The id of the sub-issue to be prioritized before (either positional argument after OR before should be specified).
